review:
I WAS SUFFERING FROM ANTERIOR GLENOID LABRUM TEAR. 
I WAS ADVISED FOR SURGERY BY OTHER DOCTORS. BUT WHEN I SHOWED MY REPORTS TO DR. IMTIAZ HE TOLD ME SURGERY IS NOT REQUIRED AND TREATED ME WITHOUT SURGERY. THE TREATMENT WAS SPEEDY AND NOW I AM BACK TO MY SPORTS ACTIVITY WITHOUT SURGERY.
THANKS A LOT DR. IMTIAZ
A lot of faith After meet  the doctor  above problem.  Explain  of problem by doctor and easily treated with out surgery after tests.
